full_text: New Axion X5 Five problems, one solution. When I do the dishes I have to deal with a lot of problems such as stripping away the grease, eliminating stains, bacteria and bad odors; that is why I have to buy different products, and on top of all of that my hands get dry. The new Axion X5 helps you with all these problems when you do the dishes Its breakthrough formula with active molecules is designed to: 1.Remove ease faster 2.Kill 99.99% bacteria 3.Eliminate odors 4.Remove stains from your dishes 5.Care for your hands Say goodbye to problems when you do the dishes. New Axion X5, five problems, one solution AXION : Liquid
